sqlMap.select: SELECT /* Main_Mysql.xml main.getRecommandList */ B.PROD_NO , C.PROD_NM , C.PRODUCT_EXPL_TEXT , D.CATE_NAME , E.URL_PATH , E.SAVE_FILE_NAME FROM TB_DISP_PROD_ON_MAIN A LEFT JOIN TB_PRODUCT_MASTER B ON A.PROD_NO = B.PROD_NO LEFT JOIN TB_PRODUCT_NAME C ON B.PROD_NO = C.PROD_NO AND C.LANG_CD = #LANG_CD# LEFT JOIN TB_CATEGORY_NM D ON B.PROD_LCATE_CD = D.CATE_CODE AND D.LANG_CD = #LANG_CD# LEFT JOIN TB_PRODUCT_IMAGE E ON B.PROD_NO = E.PROD_NO AND E.LANG_CD = #LANG_CD# WHERE A.DISPLAY_TYPE_CD = 'R' AND str_to_date(A.VALID_START_DT, '%Y%m%d') <= now() AND str_to_date(A.VALID_END_DT, '%Y%m%d') >= now() AND B.SEEN_CUSTOMER_YN = 'Y' AND E.IMG_TYPE_CD = 'M' ORDER BY A.INSERT_DT DESC LIMIT 4;

SELECT /* Main_Mysql.xml main.getPopularList */ B.PROD_NO , C.PROD_NM , C.PRODUCT_EXPL_TEXT , D.CATE_NAME , E.URL_PATH , E.SAVE_FILE_NAME FROM TB_DISP_PROD_ON_MAIN A LEFT JOIN TB_PRODUCT_MASTER B ON A.PROD_NO = B.PROD_NO LEFT JOIN TB_PRODUCT_NAME C ON B.PROD_NO = C.PROD_NO AND C.LANG_CD = #LANG_CD# LEFT JOIN TB_CATEGORY_NM D ON B.PROD_LCATE_CD = D.CATE_CODE AND D.LANG_CD = #LANG_CD# LEFT JOIN TB_PRODUCT_IMAGE E ON B.PROD_NO = E.PROD_NO AND E.LANG_CD = #LANG_CD# WHERE A.DISPLAY_TYPE_CD = 'P' AND str_to_date(A.VALID_START_DT, '%Y%m%d') <= now() AND str_to_date(A.VALID_END_DT, '%Y%m%d') >= now() AND B.SEEN_CUSTOMER_YN = 'Y' AND E.IMG_TYPE_CD = 'M' ORDER BY A.INSERT_DT DESC LIMIT 4;
